i711th, RTX3050

Win11

KSP2 v0.1.1.0

  • After speed up and come back to normal speed, it's hard to use the ball of orbit planing. (only pause first and then resume to solve)
  • In the solar system view, if you want to click on another planet as a target, you will often point to its moon (typically Duna), so the predicted orbital intersection will not be displayed.
  • Cannot change satellites' name in tracking station (at least with Chinese), after changed the name and open the page of tracking station again, the original name will come back...

 

I don't know how to solve them, I just a normal player, so what I can do is point out the ploblem. Hope the tips will be useful

Without any mods

anso

  • Whether the rocket accelerates or not, the fairing will fly into the sky rather than fall naturally
